review: We got this mostly because (1) our Sling TV app was twitchy through a PC, despite good wireless connection; (2) our Roku is too old to run Sling TV, and we're waiting to purchase Roku 4; (3) we were interested in trying another Amazon product, because we've had good luck with them; and (4) the Fire Stick was free with three months' purchase of Sling TV.We've been happy with it, although it has nowhere near as many channels as Roku (including Nowhere Man, draw poker, and many more). It does well with the big apps like Amazon Prime and Sling TV, thought, so we're happy. We had to relocate the stick to the HDMI on the side of the TV, as it didn't do well amid other HDMI cables. Relocating it fixed it.While we'll likely upgrade to Roku 4 when available, we'll continue to find a use for this device. Recommended.
